name: Irvin Ortega
coverLetter: I am a trimmer with 4 years of experience. I have worked with private opps and shops within the Los Angeles and Santa Barbra county. I have trimmed hybrids, sativas and Indicas. I have no issue working with wet or dry buds. I'm currently seeking work locally and out of town if available ( with shelter and food included). Daily bud trimmed ranges between 2-4 pounds a day depending on hours. References available upon request, thank you!
